dcterms:creator: Siva Reddy
Serge Sharoff
dcterms:description: A dataset containing Kannada words used for Lopa and Adesha Sandhi generation, facilitating the study of euphonic changes in Kannada.
dcterms:title: Kannada words for Lopa and Adesha Sandhi

dcterms:creator: Rohit Gupta
Pulkit Goyal
Sapan Diwakar
dcterms:description: Transliteration dictionaries that facilitate the conversion of Kannada words into WX notation, aiding in the processing of Kannada text.
dcterms:title: Transliteration dictionaries for Kannada

dcterms:creator: S Rajashekara Murthy
A. N. Akshatha
Chandana G Upadhyaya
P. Ramakanth Kumar
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes a Kannada spell checker and a sandhi splitter, which helps in identifying and correcting spelling errors and splitting sandhi in Kannada text.
dcterms:title: Kannada spell checker and sandhi splitter

dcterms:creator: Jeena Kleenankandy
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sandhi rules for Malayalam, which can be referenced for comparative studies in sandhi generation across languages.
dcterms:title: Sandhi rules for Malayalam

dcterms:creator: Vidhwan N Ranganatha Sharma
dcterms:description: A comprehensive set of Kannada grammar rules that serve as a foundational reference for linguistic studies and applications in Kannada.
dcterms:title: Kannada grammar rules

dcterms:creator: H. L. Shashirekha
K. S. Vanishree
dcterms:description: A dataset containing rules for Kannada Agama sandhi splitting, which can be utilized in the development of sandhi generation tools.
dcterms:title: Agama sandhi rules

dcterms:creator: Amba P. Kulkarni
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes tools for generating sandhi in Sanskrit, which can provide insights into sandhi generation techniques applicable to other languages.
dcterms:title: Sanskrit sandhi generation tools
